data.text: @bernybelvedere You are posting this without basic diligence such a looking at follower counts..? Many or most of these could be bots/trolls, right?

@bernybelvedere @NGrossman81 What is "Covid theater" because anyone pushing for a ludicrous national border wall as some immigration and drug solution has no credibility to explain it like Ronny Deatantis. He's also lying about mask science here.
@bernybelvedere "not only will republicans not help protect you from deadly disease, they will stop you from protecting yourself"
@bernybelvedere Because Florida is one State full of dumb asses...

@bernybelvedere They do love an asshole, don't they.
Think it is the generation raised in reality TV and WWE?
